title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Now his golf balls are displayed on placks along the walls of his basement.” [From an Ohio AP wire, January 1984. Submitted by Randy Alfred, San Francisco, California.]

Internet Archive copy of this issue
